metadata.title: CVE-2019-19246 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Oniguruma through 6.9.3, as used in PHP 7.3.x and other products, has aheap-based buffer over-read in str_lower_case_match in regexec.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libonig4 - 6.7.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libonig package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.7.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
